Key Match Events: Ishan Kishan hit an explosive 89 to set up a thumping 62-run victory for India
Shreyas Iyer provided the late charge with an unbeaten 57
Bhuveshwar Kumar (2/9 in 2 overs) and Venkatesh Iyer (2/36) limited Sri Lanka to 137 for 6 in 20 overs
Rohit Sharma became the highest scorer in all T20Is
Yuzvendra Chahal (67 wickets) overtook Jasprit Bumrah as India's top wicket-taker in T20Is
Post-Match Reflections: Skipper Dasun Shanaka's (3) stay lasted six balls as Chahal overtook Bumrah to become India's leading wicket taker (67) in T20Is
Playing second fiddle, skipper Rohit ran the ones and twos hard and picked up two fours along with a cracking slog-sweep over mid-wicket for a six
Miscellaneous Highlights: Asked to take first strike, Kishan was unstoppable at the top as he blasted a blistering 56-ball 89
Sri Lanka was also guilty of dropping Ishan with spinner Jeffrey Vandersay spilling him on his own bowling in the 7th over

Left-arm spinner Praveen Jayawickrama was next hammered for a four, while a short ball from Chameera was deposited into the stands as Kishan continued his demolition act which yielded 58 in the powerplay
